Text: Final Privacy Rule Issuedis a link to Miller Chevaliers December HIPAA Alert regarding the final privacy rule This document is in pdf format and should be viewed with Adobe Reader publiclibraryHIPAAAlertpdf The August issue that is referenced in the December Alert is located at publiclibraryHIPAAAlertpdf If you do not have Adobe Reader loaded on your computer you may download it from the Internet at no charge Simply click on this link to the Adobe web site prodindexacrobatreadstephtml and follow the simple instructions at the bottom of the page If you have difficulty opening the document prefer to receive a copy by mail or if you would like to add a colleagues name to the distribution list contact Ashley Vance Email or Telephone
